title: Fix language switching to update entire interface

requirements.text: Fix the language switching mechanism so that when a user selects a new language from the dropdown, all text across the entire application interface updates immediately to reflect the chosen language

quotes: 切换语言后应用没有正确更新 现在选择完语言整个界面没有切换语言

acceptanceCriteria: After selecting a language from the dropdown, all visible text in the UI immediately updates to the selected language
The language change persists across page refreshes
All components (SplashScreen, MainApp, BountyBoard, LaunchMission, PersonalCenter, QuestCard, etc.) display text in the selected language
No manual page refresh is required for the language change to take effect

constraints: Do not modify files or components other than those directly related to the language switching mechanism
Preserve existing localStorage persistence for language selection
Keep the current useLanguage hook structure intact
nonGoals: Adding new languages to the system
Changing UI component layouts or styling
